sqlMap.update: update user_layer set layer_name = #layer_name#, layer_desc = #layer_desc#, layer_source = #layer_source#, fields = CAST (#fields# as json), publisher_name = #publisher_name#, style_id = #style_id# where id = #id# and uuid =#uuid#
